message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations or personal projects. Given its high quality and unique features, I am confident it will be a valuable addition to you. Considering its worth, I am offering it to you for $15000. This is a special opportunity to acquire a product that I believe could greatly benefit you.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on this product. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to consider offers within the range of $12000 or less. I would like to make a counteroffer at $14000.
